content: Vijayanand "Vijay" Nagarajan Vijay Nagarajan Professor Kahlert School of Computing The University of Utah Warnock Engineering Building 2897 72 Central Campus Drive Salt Lake City, Utah, 84112 Office Phone: (+1) 801 581-7026 E-mail: vijay at cs.utah.edu (FREE E-book) Publications CAPS Research Group Teaching Personal CV Open PhD Positions: You have a good background in computer architecture or programming languages or computer systems with good programming skills. Email your CV! Research Our research broadly spans computer architecture, programming languages, and computer systems. We embrace the constructive, specification-directed approach to system design where possible. We've found the approach not only leads to correctness but also to efficiency. A full list of publications can be found here. Code can be found here.
